String.string: [Apex] Velika Banquet
"I'd be honored."
Talk to Braga.
Use the invitation to teleport to Velika.
Platform - Velika
You see Nerinder.
Talk to Nerinder to go to the Velika Banquet.
Velika Banquet Entrance
Arrived at Velika Banquet Entrance.
Talk to Nerinder and teleport to the Velika Banquet.
"I'll have a word with the Guard Captain."
Talk to Verdas. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"I see. Very well."
Speak with Kamilia. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"Thank you."
Go to Velika Headquarters and speak to Seir. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"I guess I’ll hit the dance floor, then."
Speak to Meren to get information about the celebration. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
Banquet Dance Floor
Dance with the people.
Go to the Dance Floor. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
That was exhilirating!

Type "/dance" in your Chat window to dance.
(The quest completes when you finish dancing.) [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"I am a bit hungry, actually."
Speak to Etomar. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
Traditional Bleakfields BBQ
Freeholds Flame Salad
Bleak Wings

All this dancing has worked up an appetite.
Speak to Eritomar. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"I can hardly wait."
"This smells wonderful!"
Take your meal. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"Mmm...looks tasty!"
Take your meal. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"Ah, nice and spicy!"
Take your meal. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
Eat the Traditional Bleakfields BBQ. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
Eat the Freeholds Flame Salad. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
Eat the Bleak Wings. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"Okay. Thanks."
Speak to Eritomar. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"Just pick one, eh?"
Speak to Carbest. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
Use the key to open one of the four boxes. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"Sure, I can see that."
Obtain the Velika Banquet Coin from the lucky box. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
Speak to Carbest. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
"Why, thank you!"
Speak to Meren. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet.]
